title: President condoles demise of Balochistan Minister Sarfaraz Domki
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 16 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday expressed grief over the death of Balochistan Provincial Minister for Local Government and Rural Development Mir Sarfaraz Chakar Domki.
The president lauded the political services of the late Mir Sarfaraz Domki and expressed his sympathies for the bereaved family.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
